item.description: Price: (as of – Details) An Amazon Brand – This classic sherpa lined sweatshirt is perfect as a finishing touch to a cool-weather look or a comfy base layer when it’s time to bundle up Package Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 16.85 x 12.01 x 3.58 inches; 1.46 Pounds Item model number ‏ : ‎ AE1898416 ... item.content:encoded:
Price: $30.60
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:59:50 UTC – Details)


An Amazon Brand – This classic sherpa lined sweatshirt is perfect as a finishing touch to a cool-weather look or a comfy base layer when it’s time to bundle up
Package Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 16.85 x 12.01 x 3.58 inches; 1.46 Pounds
Item model number ‏ : ‎ AE1898416
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ November 22, 2021
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Amazon Essentials
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B08X2GBGKV

Imported
Machine Wash
This classic sherpa lined sweatshirt is perfect as a finishing touch to a cool-weather look or a comfy base layer when it’s time to bundle up
Features a front pocket, sherpa-lined hood with drawstrings, and ribbing at the hem and cuffs
Everyday made better: we listen to customer feedback and fine-tune every detail to ensure quality, fit, and comfort
